oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1948-01-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from January 10, 1948. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan, and guests Jerry Colonna and Montie Montana.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Jerry Colonna; Montie Montana
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'Jerry And His Donkey Honky' (Jerry Colonna, Montie Montana, cast) [continued from part 1] -- Foy Willing and Jerry Colonna talk -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Foy Willing introduces Jerry Colonna -- Riding The Old Donner Trail (Jerry Colonna, Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Closing statement (Foy Willing) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Farnworth, Scott; Colonna, Jerry, 1904-1986; Montana, Montie
